title: AlphaTALKS Wall Street Breakfast, Aug. 21: What Moved Markets This Week
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Stocks gave up some ground this week as prospects of Fed tapering bond purchases and continued intervention by Chinese regulators hurt risk appetite. Friday saw a broad-based rally in stocks, but for the week major indices were all lower. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Stocks gave up some ground this week as prospects of Fed tapering bond purchases and continued intervention by Chinese regulators hurt risk appetite.
